name: Survive The Seasons
description:
Should be submitted for Brackeys Jam 2023.1, but we missed the deadline..... (with a day)

In this game you are a plant, that somehow evolved a gun and there are some evil flying thingys, that want to kill you, so you need to kill them before they kill you. You get dna for killing them and you can spend that dna on upgrades, that you will give you different boosts. 

CONTROLS:

LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT AND CLICK STUFF

HOLD LEFT CLICK ON UPGRADES TO BUY THEM

Tips:

You choose the gun upgrade, even after buying one, so if you do not like the gun you bought, you can switch to the old one.

If an enemy gets to a wrong season (the enemys season is it color and it is always the season you are currently on, it also drops the dna of the season it is), it will get instakillable and weakened.
